forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then partly cloudy for the afternoon. High 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then becoming windy with a steady rain overnight. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with a steady, soaking rain late. Increasing winds. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 56F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.
